title: Language Education Curriculum Utilizing Multimedia Learning Design

context.additional_context: Conducting computer-based learning activities centered on smartphones in limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of effectively combining multimedia elements (audio, text, images).
Learners can achieve an accuracy rate of over 80% in understanding language learning content.
Learners can reduce the gap between actual and perceived comprehension to within 20%.
Learners can evaluate learning materials incorporating complementary text-image design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
